Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Blur
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Your hero can't take damage this turn.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor:
"What are you trying to tell me? That I can dodge axes?" 
"I’m trying to tell you that when you’re a Demon Hunter, you won’t have to."

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Battlefiend
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Consume Magic
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Silence an enemy_minion. Outcast: Draw a card.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Please be mindful when consuming raw or undercooked magic.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Feast of Souls
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Draw a card for each friendly minion that died this turn.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Nothing fills you up like soul food!

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Mana Burn
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Your opponent has 2 fewer Mana Crystals next turn.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: One way to ensure that they are not prepared.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Twin Slice
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Add 'Second Slice' to your hand.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: The slice so nice, it'll cut you twice.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Ur'zul Horror
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Deathrattle: Add a 2/1 Lost Soul to your hand.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: You face face face face face Jaraxxus!

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Umberwing
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Felwings.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Demon Hunters refer to these glaives as "the ol’ flappy-attackys."

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Blade Dance
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to 3 random enemy minions.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: The surest way to clear the dance floor.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Eye Beam
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. Outcast: This costs (1).
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Sometimes looks CAN kill.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Wrathscale Naga
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a_random enemy.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor:
If throwing glaives is what you crave; 
summon tokens and make 'em broken.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Altruis the Outcast
Demon Hunter Initiate.text:
[x]After you play the left-
or right-most card in your
hand, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Altruis betrayed Illidan to forge his own way in Outland. With Blackjack. And Netherdrakes.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Illidari Felblade
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Rush Outcast: Gain Immune this_turn.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: A whirling dervish of demonic devastation.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Raging Felscreamer
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Soul Split
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Choose a friendly Demon. Summon a copy of it.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Spoiler: they're both the evil twin.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Command the Illidari
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Summon six 1/1_Illidari with Rush.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor:
Give me an R! 
Give me a U! 
Give me an S! 
Give me an H! 
You two, you’re exclamation points!

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Wrathspike Brute
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: [x]Taunt After this is attacked, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: You scratch her back, her back scratches back.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Flamereaper
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero_attacks.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Honestly it sows more flame than it reaps.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Hulking Overfiend
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: To hulk, perhaps, to fiend: ay, there's the rub.

Demon Hunter Initiate.name: Nethrandamus
Demon Hunter Initiate.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random @-Cost minions. (Upgrades each time a friendly minion dies!)
Demon Hunter Initiate.flavor: Missed the big descent with the other dragons. But better late and nether!
